summary: Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?
cast: Gregory Peck|Richard Crenna|David Janssen|James Franciscus|Gene Hackman|Lee Grant|Nancy Kovack|Mariette Hartley|Scott Brady|Frank Marth|Craig Huebing|John Carter|Vincent Van Lynn|George Gaynes|Tom Stewart|Duke Hobbie|Walter Brooke|Dennis Robertson|Don Ames|Dick Cherney|Bill Couch|Matt Emery|John Forsythe|Robert Hitchcock|Mauritz Hugo|Kenner G. Kemp|Mary Linda Rapelye|Bruce Rhodewalt|George R. Robertson|Clark Ross|John Roy|Eddie Smith|George Smith|Robert Strong
title: Atrapados en el espacio
